ryid=#{ryid}

SELECT llc.jzkcid, jzkcxx.wz, jzkcxx.bh, jzkcxx.mc, jzkcxx.ph, jzkcxx.ly, jzkcxx.rksl, jzkcxx.kcl, jzkcxx.yds, jzkcxx.gg, (coalesce(jzkcxx.kcl,0) - coalesce(jzkcxx.yds,0)) klsl, jzkcxx.kbs FROM igams_jzllc llc left join igams_jzkcxx jzkcxx on jzkcxx.jzkcid = llc.jzkcid
